title: Miyeon Loveseat
description:
A new addition to Acme's collection of exclusive designs, the Miyeon loveseat in cherry finish is full of handsome details. Nailhead trim along the padded seat base runs up the scrolled arms and arched seatbacks. Button tufting on the seatback makes the fabric upholstery look especially cozy. Raised floral motifs embellish the Queen Anne legs of the piece.

description:
Introduce our new design for the Dresden loveseat. Features vintage bone white color, this loveseat creates an elegant and traditional design into your living room.
